title: What is the easiest musical instrument to learn  by watching Youtube videos? - Quora

response.answer_text: Acoustic guitar will be the best...its a very common instrument....doesn't differ much from places to places..the theory, atleast the basic theory stays universal...and there are lots and lots of guitar lessons for almost every favorite song of yours...I have learnt guitar this way....so pick up the guitar...plug in the earphones and enjoy!!!!

You should, if you are monetarily able, pay for lessons for at least 2 to 3 years. If you have a good deal of musical experience on another instrument already, you could try to teach yourself. However it will always be easier with a teacher. The Irish penny-whistle can be very easy to play, however this is coming from an oboe player. The fingerings are mostly the same. Good luck!
